Alternatively, it can also result in states in which a person's vision will zoom into the minute details of a small object, allowing them to see it from a perspective similar to that of a microscope. [p]This effect is considerably more likely to occur if a person spends extended periods of time staring at an object or scene within the distance.[/p]
